titleFormatted.en: Set blink type for [[device]] to [[blink_type]] with [[blinks]] blinks

titleFormatted.nl: Stel knipper-type in voor [[device]] op [[blink_type]] met [[blinks]] keer knipperen
titleFormatted.de: Blinktyp für [[device]] auf [[blink_type]] mit [[blinks]] Blinkzeichen setzen

instruction.en:
Plug in or toggle the unit to start pairing.

If pairing does not automatically start you probably need to reset the unit with a remote or a philips hue bridge.

hint.en: (0-255). The device must support this feature. (Some device need a firmware update and some does not support it at all).

label.en: Default light temperature on Power On

hint.en: (153-500). The device must support this feature. (Some device need a firmware update and some does not support it at all).
The device must support this feature. (Some device need a firmware update and some does not support it at all).

instruction.en: Push button 1 for three to five seconds.

Hold the button for at least 3 seconds until the LED blinks red.
If this does not work, reset the button and try again.

Hold the setup button on the back for at least 10 seconds until the LED is green.
Disclaimer: This will reset the dimmer switch!

Push a pin down the small hole under the battery lid for at least 10 seconds until the LED is green.
Disclaimer: This will reset the dimmer switch!
Hold the setup button on the back for at least 10 seconds until the LED is green.

label.en: Time until motion alarm is reset (s)

hint.en:
Time from motion alarm triggers until it resets.
default: 3 [s]

Set a correction to compensate a temperature offset.
Range: -10 - 10, step size 0.1, 
default: 0 [°C]
hint.nl:
Stel een correctiewaarde in om een temperature verschil te compenseren.
Bereik: -10 - 10, stap grootte 0.1, 
standaard: 0 [°C]

hint.en: This setting determines the threshold before a battery alarm is given.
Min interval before a report is sent to Homey (s)
Max interval before a report is sent to Homey (s)
Min interval before a report is sent to Homey (s)
Max interval before a report is sent to Homey (s)

instruction.en: Hold the setup button on the back for at least 10 seconds until the LED is green.

hint.en: Choose the motion sensitivity level. Changes will take effect when the device comes online.
hint.sv: Välj nivån på rörelsekänsligheten. Ändringar träder i kraft när enheten är online.

hint.en: Enable or disable the LED indicator when motion is detected. Changes will take effect when the device comes online.
hint.sv: Aktivera eller inaktivera LED-indikatorn när rörelse upptäcks. Ändringar träder i kraft när enheten är online.

hint.en:
Set a correction to compensate a temperature offset.
Range: -10 - 10, step size 0.1, 
default: 0 [°C]
hint.nl:
Stel een correctiewaarde in om een temperature verschil te compenseren.
Bereik: -10 - 10, stap grootte 0.1, 
standaard: 0 [°C]
